coreAttributes.name: Assault Cannon
coreAttributes.description: An Astartes Mark VIII Absolo Pattern Assault Cannon with a great fire rate but also an overheating issue for prolonged battles.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Shoot at [npc2.name] with your assault cannon.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the assault cannon. For the Emperor!

hitDescriptions.hitText: Pulling on the trigger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] hundreds of bolter rounds at [npc2.name].
Opening fire, [npc2.name] is showered with a downpour of bolter rounds!
Aiming at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(open)] fire and [npc.verb(let)] the bolter rounds pierce the air and colliding with [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Pulling on the trigger, [npc.name] [npc.verb(fire)] hundreds of bolter rounds at [npc2.name], but [npc2.name] saw it coming and managed to avoid the rounds.
Opening fire, [npc2.name] is showered with a downpour of bolter rounds! [npc2.name] managed to stay out of [npc.namePos] line of sight.
Aiming at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(open)] fire and [npc.verb(let)] the bolter rounds pierce the air but they do not collide with [npc2.name]!
